001package reciprocal.geometry.circle;
002
003import static java.util.Objects.hash;
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.io.Serial;
007import java.io.Serializable;
008import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
009import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
010
011/**
012 * Base class for circles
013 *
014 * @param <N> number
015 * @param <C> circle
016 * @since 0.0.1
017 */
018public abstract class AbstractCircle<N extends Number, C extends AbstractCircle<N, C>>
019    implements Comparable<C>, Serializable {
020    @Serial
021    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
022
023    private final @NotNull N radius;
024
025    /**
026     * Constructor
027     *
028     * @param radius radius
029     * @throws NullPointerException when {@code radius == null}
030     * @since 0.0.1
031     */
032    protected AbstractCircle(final @NotNull N radius) {
033        this.radius = requireNonNull(radius, "radius");
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * Diameter
038     *
039     * @return diameter
040     * @since 0.0.1
041     */
042    public abstract @NotNull N getDiameter();
043
044    /**
045     * Circumference
046     *
047     * @return circumference
048     * @since 0.0.1
049     */
050    public abstract @NotNull N getCircumference();
051
052    /**
053     * Area
054     *
055     * @return area
056     * @since 0.0.1
057     */
058    public abstract @NotNull N getArea();
059
060    /**
061     * Radius
062     *
063     * @return radius
064     * @since 0.0.1
065     */
066    public final @NotNull N getRadius() {
067        return radius;
068    }
069
070    @Override
071    public final int hashCode() {
072        return hash(radius);
073    }
074
075    @Override
076    public final boolean equals(final @Nullable Object obj) {
077        if (this == obj) {
078            return true;
079        }
080        if (obj == null || getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
081            return false;
082        }
083        final var other = (AbstractCircle<?, ?>) obj;
084        return radius.equals(other.getRadius());
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    public final @NotNull String toString() {
089        return getClass().getSimpleName() + "{radius=" + radius + "}";
090    }
091}
